__e: Robin Hood is as good as dead.
I am not your enemy, Hood is.
Well, if it isn't Robin Hood.
My name is Robin Hood and this is an ambush!
You go out in the 'hood and get him some corner boys to mess with.
- With their help I kill Robin Hood and every man, woman and child which he supports.
Robin Hood killed your brother with his talk of fighting for a better future.
Hood was, did you know... Didn't try and rescue you.
Ah! Now, Robin Hood tells me that you told him where the ledger is.
